name: Rainbow Lands
description:
Fight for the safety of your homeland. 
Defend it from the alien invasion by building powerful turrets. 
Try your best to set the highest score in this endless tower defense.

GAMEPLAY TIPS

Select tower from tower menu and place it on appropriate spot with Left Mouse Button.
You can cancel the building of tower by pressing Right Mouse Button.
Sell already placed tower by pressing Right Mouse Button.
Check enemies HP by hovering cursor on them.
